attributes.action: Ban loud fireworks being sold to the public
attributes.additional_details: We all know that fireworks are set off different days during November and not just on the 5th young teenage boys are setting them off from when they enter the shops . This causes a lot of stress to animals dogs, cats, horses ,birds etc the list goes on I don't want a ban on fireworks just the ones that make a loud bangs . Unless it's at a organised venue.
attributes.background: Fireworks that bang cause unnecessary stress to animals and it's not just for one day now . I think it would be better that fireworks that make loud noises should be at an event and not sold to the public only colourful ones .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign one of these petitions which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013 or https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700049
